name: Prisoner's Quest
description:
The guards in the dungeon have lost some items. And you are looking to escape. Maybe you can help each other out.

To move: arrow keys
To interact: Space

This is an entry for The Indie Tales Jam 2021
Single person team
Game, Art, and Music made between July 9, 2021 - July 12, 2021 (duration of the Game Jam)

Tested on Chrome (on Mac)
